trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle routed event that occur when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestir√† l'evento indirizzato che si verificano quando una descrizione comandi viene aperto e chiuso.

trans-unit.source: When a tooltip opens and closes, this delegate provides an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando una descrizione comandi viene aperto e chiuso, il delegato fornisce un gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies the tooltip inherits from either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento che specifica la descrizione comando eredita da uno <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, open and close events exist on both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, gli eventi di aperti e chiusura presenti in entrambe le classi.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that use this event handler.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente elenca gli eventi che utilizzano questo gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: |Events that occur when a tooltip opens|Events that occur when a tooltip closes| |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| These events are registered by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class does not expose these events on itself (attached or otherwise).
trans-unit.target: | Gli eventi che si verificano quando viene visualizzata una descrizione comando | Gli eventi che si verificano quando si chiude una descrizione comando | |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| Questi eventi sono registrati per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>usando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>campi, ma la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>classe espone i seguenti eventi nella stessa (associati o in caso contrario).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event by defining the events in the previous table, copying the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> fields to create new routed event identifiers that exist on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>entrambe le classi implementano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>ed esporre questo evento definendo gli eventi nella tabella precedente, la copia di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>campi per creare nuovi identificatori indirizzati dell'evento che esiste nel <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>classi.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If the tooltip is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are also raised when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Se la descrizione comando viene definita come un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>oggetto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>classe vengono generati anche quando una descrizione comandi viene aperto e chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>
